Thank you for your purchase!
 
 Order EE-49158 
 


We're getting it ready to be shipped and will notify you once it's on its way. 
For orders with both in-stock and pre-order items, in-stock products will ship first, unless you'd like everything to ship together. Just let us know!
 
We take a lot of pride in our products and want to make sure you have the best possible experience. We are here to help with any questions that crosses your mind during the shipping process and after you receive your product, available by phone through 844-416-2090 between the hours of 9am to 6pm pst every day, or can answer through our chat at eurekaergonomic.com 24/7.
 
 
Your order will be arriving by one of our selected carriers and will be contacting you directly and may display as an unlisted number. They will make up to 3 attempts, if no confirmation can be provided to the carrier, the order will be returned back to us.
 
 
Due to shipping through a freight carrier, these items are excluded from our 30 Day Free Return and you will be responsible for the return shipping fee if you choose to return the item due to unrelated issues. Click here for full return policy
